specifications.Finish: Mechanical > Washer Washer is a post-treatment mainly applied to woven fabrics with a sturdy structure. Through washing processes, it induces slight shrinkage and creates natural creases and streaks, adding a vintage-like appearance and texture to the fabric. Chemical > Water Repellent Water repellent finishing is a chemical treatment applied to the fabric surface to make water bead and roll off. This enhances resistance to light rain and splashes, helping garments stay drier and more comfortable without compromising breathability.
specifications.Care Advice: Chemical > Water Repellent Due to the nature of the chemical coating agents, chalk marks may appear on the surface of the fabric. Please handle it with care.
specifications.Care Instructions: Machine wash cold / Gentle Wash with similar colors Do not bleach Tumble dry normal low heat Do not iron Do not dry clean Recommended Use Activewear, Nylon Shorts
